    About

    I’m a Computer Science student at Vanderbilt University with minors in Data Science and Digital Fabrication, graduating in May 2026. Originally from Brooklyn, NY, I’m passionate about combining data-driven insights with hands-on digital fabrication.

    Education

    Vanderbilt University - Nashville, TN
    B.S. Computer Science, Minors in Data Science & Digital Fabrication | Aug 2022 – May 2026

    • Honors: Posse Foundation Full-Tuition Leadership Scholar (2022-2026)
    • Relevant Coursework: AI, Machine Learning, Data Centrix, C++, Operating Systems, Database Management Systems, Data Structures & Algorithms, Programming Languages, Data Science, Digital Fabrication, Statistics

    Experience

    Data Engineering Intern | Apple | Jun 2025 – Sep 2025
    Cupertino, CA

    • Designed and deployed a production-grade data pipeline using Spark & Airflow from scratch to transform terabytes of data
    • Integrated structured data into structures analyses for ML use cases for ML distance
    • Built a dynamic decision-tree framework that charts all questions for meal logging, enabling instantaneous visualization and classification of nutrition data, reducing analysis time by 40%
    • Partnered with ML engineers to integrate processed health data into predictive analytics workflows impacting ML models for health applications

    Research Assistant | The Nature Conservancy of Hawaii, Vanderbilt University | May 2024 – Aug 2024
    Nashville, TN

    • Built data pipelines using Geospatial to clean & transform migration datasets; improved accuracy by 20%
    • Applied clustering/visualization to reveal environmental drivers of migration

    Academic Support | Ingram Athletics Center Tutor | Jan 2025 – Ongoing
    Vanderbilt University

    • Mentored 20+ students in logic design and data path engineering; guided lab projects and debugged digital systems

    Research Assistant | Uki Research, Computer Science Dept | Jan 2024 – May 2025
    Nashville, TN

    • Engineered modular data pipelines for migration forecasting; integrated geospatial feature extraction and advanced logic using Python
    • Achieved 15% higher predictive accuracy and reduced model training runtime by 30%

    Projects

    Lore Dynasty Researcher | Sept 2024 – Dec 2024

    • Built scalable PyTorch models for risk/reliability analysis of renewable energy systems; expanded abstraction from 10+ to 100+ buses, improving reliability by 15%

    UI Designer | Jan 2023 – Aug 2024
    New York City, NY

    • Created multi-platform-informed UI for an AI game dev platform (React, Flask); streamlined frontend and backend workflows and collaborated closely with backend data pipelines
